subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Badminton
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The world badminton champions Cai Yun and Fu Haifeng of China criticized London’s aging Wembley arena, claiming the site for next year’s Olympic badminton tournament is “dirty” and looks like a “warehouse.”
snippet: The world badminton champions Cai Yun and Fu Haifeng of China criticized London’s aging Wembley arena, claiming the site for next year’s Olympic badminton tournament is “dirty” and looks like a “warehouse.”
